entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening then changing to light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
